references.paper_title: High-Resolution Image Synthesis with Latent Diffusion Models
references.reason: This paper introduces Latent Diffusion Models, which is fundamental to the text-to-image generation approach used in InfiniteYou.
This paper introduces Diffusion Transformers (DiTs), a key component of InfiniteYou that allows for high-quality image generation.
This paper introduces the Transformer architecture, which is foundational to DiTs and used for attention mechanisms in InfiniteYou.

references.paper_title: IP-Adapter: Text Compatible Image Prompt Adapter for Text-to-Image Diffusion Models
references.reason: This paper describes IP-Adapter, a method for incorporating image prompts into text-to-image diffusion models, which is used in other existing methods that InfiniteYou is designed to improve upon.

references.paper_title: Adding Conditional Control to Text-to-Image Diffusion Models
references.reason: This paper presents ControlNet, a method for adding conditional control to text-to-image diffusion models, which is generalized by InfuseNet in InfiniteYou to inject identity information.
